text: Owen Heary (born 4 October 1976) is an Irish manager and professional football player. He used to be the boss of the League of Ireland First Division team Shelbourne, where he played for most of his career.Bohs win EA Sports League Cup Heary becomes number 2 to Callaghan Heary takes charge of Bohemians == References == Category:Irish footballers Category:Irish football managers Category:Living people Category:1976 births
title: Owen Heary
